name: Brick Dodge
description:
An amazing 2D game that will test your reflexes and decision speed. Choose between three difficulties and try to survive as much time as possibile while collecting coins to raise your score and time limit!FEATURES

Three difficulty levels:

  • Easy: for casual players
  • Normal: for those that want a bit of a challenge
  • Hard: test your skills in this high-speed mode

Three types of coins:

  • Yellow: 1 point, +4 seconds
  • Red: 5 point, +4 seconds
  • Green: 1 point, +10 seconds

Power Ups:

  • 2xCoin
  • Freeze glasses
  • Shield
  • Speed Up
  • Speed Down
  • Bomb

Four Backgrounds

In game music generator: the music will change every time you play.

For more information on our game studio and upcoming games, visit the page:http://seventhtrigger.altervista.org/blog/Or our Patreon page, where you can support us:https://www.patreon.com/7thtrigger
